Prerequisite: Constitution 13 or higher

You are especially hardy, you are wounded less and irrepressible even when wounded, recovering with surprising speed.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.caElzywK1n7CuPYL]{Durable.} When you spend Hit Dice to recover Hit Points, instead of rolling, you heal the maximum possible result. For example, if a Cleric (d8) spends 2 Hit Dice on healing, they automatically regain 16 Hit Points plus their modifier for Con on both dice.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.t6djXhzjch0o0p5c]{Hardy.} You do not suffer exhaustion when you fall to 0 Hit Points. If you select this bullet a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.O727kw8qTFKY2Pv3]{second time}, you may recover up to two levels of exhaustion on a long rest.

  • Resilient Major. You gain proficiency in your choice of @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.FvZJFy1PB3aS7w0o]{Dexterity}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.rUmp01xdh7SkqqCs]{Constitution} or @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.ZMZDx0X6yLCQoYiL]{Wisdom} saving throw. You are required to forgo two of your feat bullets to select Resilient Major.

  • Resilient Minor. You gain proficiency in your choice of @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.Jye9Z5Ks6XZQWuK0]{Strength}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.nglk162cITkY8Qmg]{Intelligence}, or @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.uRwSZLx8NuMaWibx]{Charisma} saving throw.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.zMO53RF63mjYjg4M]{Tenacious.} Your Hit Point maximum cannot be lowered.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.B4aHKRkjkklqI2rm]{Tooth-Cracker.} While you are not wearing any armor, your Armor Class equals 13 + your Constitution modifier. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.He1H4cOLy6WTIH5k]{Tough.} Your hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to your level when you select this bullet. Whenever you gain a level thereafter, your hit point maximum increases by an additional one hit point. You may select this bullet @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.MvnyaKFRpqELjgsX]{twice}, if you do so, you gain twice the benefit.

Prerequisite: Strength 13 or higher

You are a master of fighting with a weapon held in two hands. Your specialized training has provided you with certain advantages when employing a weapon this way.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.5SCUZpt0WsKJnmJi]{Defensive Versatility.} You gain a +1 bonus to AC while you are holding a melee weapon with the versatile property in two hands that you are proficient with.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.50MW7ZZPRZzEtQZd]{Fell Handed.} When you miss an attack roll with a melee weapon with the heavy property you are holding with two hands, you can add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll and attempt to hit a different target within reach of the same weapon. A creature can be hit only once per turn in this way.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.bLDbBdzKY2tNxFuD]{Ferocious Strike.} Before you make an attack roll with a melee weapon you are holding with two hands, you can choose to forgo your proficiency modifier to the attack roll. If the attack hits, you add twice your proficiency modifier to the damage. If you select this bullet a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.Mon6CTQJxViCCVH3]{second time}, you may choose to forgo any amount up to your proficiency modifier to the attack roll, adding twice the amount of the penalty to the damage.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.a99ZUB8yp6UDtcWp]{Heavy Handed.} Once per turn, when you have disadvantage on an attack roll you make with a melee weapon with the heavy property you are holding with two hands, the target takes damage of the weapon's type equal to your Strength modifier (minimum of 0) if the attack misses.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.uWk0YULGdoWGxL1M]{Merciless.} On your turn, when you score a critical hit with a weapon held in two hands or reduce a creature to 0 hit points with one, you can immediately make one more melee weapon attack using your bonus action. You may only benefit from Merciless once on your turn.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.3Qz5LZxfUxEHMHz0]{Pommel Strike.} When you take the attack action and make all attacks with a melee weapon you are holding in two hands with the benefit of your proficiency modifier, you can use a bonus action to make a melee attack with another part of the weapon. This attack uses the same ability modifier as the primary attack. The weapon's damage die for this attack is a d4, or d6 if the weapon has the heavy property and it deals bludgeoning damage.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.t644a81sEdtDP0ae]{Readied Weapon.} While you are wielding a reach weapon you are holding in two hands, other creatures provoke an opportunity attack from you when they enter your reach. The weapon that provoked the attack must be used to make the attack in order to use this feature.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.NqV3I16yrXPEuu7G]{Strength of Arms.} You can double the damage modifiers to all damage you deal with melee weapons you are holding with two hands, if you have not moved during your turn. Doing so reduces your speed to 0 until the start of your next turn.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.QvXBzYwCJ1NAfRos]{Weapon Versatility.} You gain proficiency in three weapons with the two handed or versatile property.

Prerequisite: Proficiency in shields

You are a master of fighting with a weapon and shield. Your specialized training has provided you with certain advantages when employing weapon combat while you have a shield equipped.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.654hflehWzQtWS39]{Barbican.} You can now make opportunity attacks while holding a tower shield.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.rc9zDwoDiiDBQ1xR]{Defensive Fighting.} Before you make a melee attack with a weapon that you are holding while wielding a buckler, shield, or tower shield in your other hand, you can choose to forgo your proficiency modifier to the attack roll. If the attack hits, the target of the attack has disadvantage on any attack rolls against you until the beginning of your next turn.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.ZZuu3U9oyVbYCWy9]{Firm Grip.} You ignore the strength requirement to wield any shield or buckler.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.KHMaE6MRGV40Mzhq]{Mobile Fortress.} While you are conscious you provide half cover against ranged attacks to creatures of your choice within 5 feet of you while you wield a shield or tower shield.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.zgAWSgsgwlFz94Xb]{Quick Guard.} When you are wielding a buckler, shield or tower shield, you can add the AC provided from your shield to your initiative roll.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.ICUxdjboyCM1bEwm]{Rapid Ready.} You may equip or stow a buckler or shield with the same interact with an object you use to equip or stow a weapon. If you select this bullet a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.wflvjmCXBglHwbW7]{second time}, you may stow a previously held weapon with the same interact with an object and you can don and doff a shield as a bonus action.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.guFBj25xHqNXbJEC]{Shield Bash.} You are proficient in the use of a buckler, shield, or tower shield as an improvised weapon, a buckler or shield has the light property and inflicts 1d4 bludgeoning damage on a successful hit. A tower shield inflicts 1d6 bludgeoning damage instead. If you are wielding a magical shield it is considered a magical weapon for the purposes of overcoming resistance to bludgeoning damage.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.2smxadE5GoempsxR]{Shield Shove.} You can use a bonus action to try to shove a creature within 5 feet of you with your shield. If you are wielding a tower shield a creature one size category larger than you does not have advantage on the ability check to avoid being shoved. If you select this bullet a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.qFhCmjAyBnsvzAEk]{second time}, you may, with a successful shove, both push the creature 5 feet and knock them prone.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.TilMBMOAIxTCuI4V]{Shielded Position.} If you are not incapacitated, you can add your buckler's, shield's or tower shield's AC bonus to any Dexterity saving throw you make against a spell or other harmful effect that targets you, and if that effect would inflict half damage on a successful saving throw, you can use your reaction to take no damage instead if you succeed on the saving throw. If you select this bullet a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.ejewhSjoyFQW3nfm]{second time}, you take only half damage if you fail the saving throw.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.z695QaPIp0BBwwXy]{Weapon Versatility.} You gain proficiency in three one handed weapons of your choice.

Your Dungeon Master may allow you to forgo two of your three feature selections from any given feat to instead receive a +1 to an ability score of your choice. Doing so permanently locks in the +1 ability score increase and you can only ever have one bullet from the parent feat.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.HjOXhDI2GC3cpJAx]{Half-Feat Variant - STR}

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.sZb64YotDRn4NpR4]{Half-Feat Variant - DEX}

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.j67GbfWIV2YEFTPu]{Half-Feat Variant - CON}

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.iOA9OfzUM85TsahT]{Half-Feat Variant - INT}

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.lyQVoZEe6RYff4GS]{Half-Feat Variant - WIS}

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.p0fRBMn4yzOvdCHK]{Half-Feat Variant - CHA}

Your Dungeon Master may allow you to forgo one of your feature selections from any given feat to instead replace it with one that matches your character's species. However, these Species Feat options cannot be part of a Half-Feat.

Multiple Bullet Species Feats

Some Species Feats either require you to forgo multiple feat bullets or give you the option to take the Species feat multiple times. In either case, you will be required to spread these species feat bullets across two different parents feats.

For example, you are playing a Halfling and at 4th level you take the parent feat @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.matFeaArmorSpeci]{Armor Specialist}. You select any two bullets from Armor Specialist but then substitute your third selection with the species feat Bountiful Luck. This is the first time you have selected Bountiful Luck as a feat selection, and you would gain no benefit at this time because it specifically requires ou to forgo two of your feat bullets.

Now the same Halfling reaches 8th level and takes the parent feat @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.matFeaSkillSpeci]{Educated}. You may take any two bullets from the Educated but then substitute the third selection with the species feat Bountiful Luck. Now this is the second time you have selected Bountiful Luck as a feat selection, and you gain the benefit of the species feat.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.XUXykn8TpMaSjsQa]{Attention to Detail}

Prerequisite: Khemri

You can use your Vigilant feature a number of additional times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.LSbjLazDxs7GzyP0]{Auric Resilience}

Prerequisite: Druegar, Hill Dwarf, or Mountain Dwarf

Any spell attack roll made against you may roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the roll. If you select this feature a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.4Rp0X3GaNuDhH58L]{second time}, any saving throw imposed on you by a spell or other magical effect is reduced by d4.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.gplmLFsWbKuMwSVy]{Bountiful Luck}

Prerequisite: Halfling

When an ally you can see within 30 feet of you rolls a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can use your reaction to let the ally reroll the die. The ally must use the new roll.
When you use this ability, you cannot use your Lucky species trait before the end of your next turn.

You are required to forgo two of your feat bullets to select Bountiful Luck.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.hoB2T97MuHl6dPc5]{Cold Blooded}

Prerequisite: Lizardfolk

Your Old Blood feature now allows you to roll a d4 and add the result on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.JNuqInS3980ha7N1]{Dragon Fear}

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.VDv4Kfk6u0FFQea1]{Prerequisite}: Dragonid

Instead of exhaling destructive energy, you can expend a use of your Breath Weapon trait to roar, forcing each creature of your choice within 30 feet of you to make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier). A target automatically succeeds on the save if it can't hear or see you. On a failed save, a target becomes frightened of you for 1 minute. If the frightened target takes any damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.VDv4Kfk6u0FFQea1]{Dragon Hide}

Prerequisite: Dragonid

Your scales harden. While you aren't wearing armor, you can calculate your AC as 13 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.KN8h1rky6qXukByo]{Drow Magic}

Prerequisite: Elf (drow)

You learn more of the magic typical of dark elves. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDetectMagi]{detect magic} spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. If you select this bullet a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.wKUJPBm0WG8mZn9a]{second time}, you also learn @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.BFsNUoPQ1HE1ytCN]{levitate} and @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDispelMagi]{dispel magic}, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast those two spells in this way when you finish a long rest. You can also cast this spell using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spell's spellcasting ability is your choice of Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.pTFPuCMv4ocV7PCg]{Dwarven Fortitude}

Prerequisite: Druegar, Hill Dwarf, or Mountain Dwarf

Whenever you take the Dodge action in combat, you can spend one Hit Die to heal yourself. Roll the die, add your Constitution modifier, and regain a number of hit points equal to the total (minimum of 1).

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.NgVWrkFZxvkk8S2Q]{Eerie Assistance}

Prerequisite: Hexling (Hexblood)

While a creature is holding your Eerie Token you can use your Action to Help them. This can be done while Remote Viewing, communicating via Telepathic Message, or being able to see the creature, as long as you are within 10 miles of it. If the creature is making an ability check that you benefit from your Hexling Proficiency from, the also can roll a d4 and add the number to the ability check, when you Help them in this way.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.8GapjiMkQH2HNDSG]{Elven Accuracy}

Prerequisite: Elf or Half-elf

Whenever you have advantage on an attack roll using Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma, you can reroll one of the dice once.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.M85lK5DgmZQPBAPN]{Fade Away}

Prerequisite: Gnome

Immediately after you take damage, you can use a reaction to magically become invisible until the end of your next turn or until you attack, deal damage, or force someone to make a saving throw. Once you use this ability, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest. If you select this bullet a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.CZLorryxZPTFbmeO]{second time}, roll a d6 at the beginning of each of your turns after using Fade Away, on a roll of 6, you may use this feature again.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.a3NlYUGsoF0qyZCR]{Fearless}

Prerequisite: Halfling

Your Brave feature becomes the Fearless feature which reads: You have advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the frightened condition on yourself. When you fail a saving throw to avoid or end the frightened condition on yourself, you can choose to succeed instead. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.hSr0N0fZuUiAWUcp]{Fey Teleport}

Prerequisite: Elf (high)

You learn the misty step spell and can cast it once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a short or long rest. If you select this bullet a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.La7I57m1dV4Xtjj1]{second time}, roll a d6 at the beginning of each of your turns after using Fey Teleport, on a roll of 6, you may use this feature again. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.Yews3qMI0AOiaWhe]{Githzerai Enlightenment}

Prerequisite: Githzerai

You learn more of the magic typical of Githzerai. You learn the feather fall spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. If you select this feature a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.P0VvKyhWYbzZsvig]{second time}, you also learn see invisiblity and haste, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast those two spells in this way when you finish a long rest. You can also cast this spell using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spell's spellcasting ability is your choice of Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.Dt5M8L6gNcmcPSzR]{Gorilla Attack}

Prerequisite: Bugbear

The extra damage from your Surprise Attack feature increases at 5th level (3d6), at 9th level (4d6), at 13th level (5d6), and at 17th level (6d6).

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.aGYKFIuqXvdgGN8y]{Hare Today, Gone Tomorrow}

Prerequisite: Padfoot

You can use your Rabbit Hop even if your speed is 0 but the distance is 5 times half your proficiency bonus , and if this jump would take you beyond the reach or effect that has you grappled or restrained, you end the grappled or restrained condition against yourself.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.rdsaO0mk5j2x3tYs]{Headlong Pace}

Prerequisite: Orc

You can use your Adrenaline Rush trait a number of times equal to twice your proficiency bonus and gain double the temporary hit points.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.xVaVR8taJs9eajMH]{Infernal Constitution}

Prerequisite: Tiefling

You have resistance to cold damage and poison damage. You have advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.g9cJRfoHgCVnEQJP]{Innate Resilience}

Prerequisite: any species that has a feature granting them advantage to avoid or end a condition on themselves

When you fail a saving throw to avoid or end a condition your species has advantage against, you can roll an additional d20 to attempt to success the saving throw. You must use the new result. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.CH2FwisZiL7i8lLS]{Inner Bellows}

Prerequisite: Dragonid

Your breath weapon recharges on a 5-6 and regardless of heritage you can choose the space of your Breath Weapon to be a 5 by 30 ft. line or 15 ft. cone each time you use the feature.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.wze6hN4ObuztYdiK]{Kin At Arms}

Prerequisite: Species that has at least one innate weapon proficiency

When you deal damage with a weapon that your species grants you proficiency with (this does not apply to weapon proficiency gain through the Proficiency Swapping rule) you can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the weapons damage roll. If you select this bullet a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.82uOXI5WCjDB9w4O]{second time}, when you make an attack roll with a weapon that your species grants you proficiency with you can roll a d4 and add the number to the weapons attack roll.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.b9JW13MaRiyK0dY5]{Mankind's Will}

Prerequisite: Human

You can use your Human Determination a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.OD5cCYJW85BadDTQ]{Orcish Fury}

Prerequisite: Orc or Orrok

When you hit with an attack using a weapon or unarmed strike, you deal bonus damage equal to one damage die of the weapon or unarmed strike. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.kyDHPFRs8QLtecwM]{Savage Magics}

Prerequisite: Orrok

When you score a critical hit with a spell attack, you can roll one of the spell's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit. If you select this bullet a second time, if a target fails it's saving throws against your spells by 5 or more, you can roll one of the spell's damage dice one additioal time and add it to the damage against the target.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.FxbeiuceyMP2UWhG]{Second Chance}

Prerequisite: Halfling

When a creature you can see hits you with an attack roll, you can use your reaction to force that creature to reroll. Once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you roll initiative at the start of combat or until you finish a short or long rest.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.DW1FHky2UniFTXOr]{Shell Armor}

Prerequisite: Tortle

The natural armor from your shell is increased by 1, and your shell now provide half-cover to other creatures of your choice that are within 5 feet of you.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.Ks8lD2nzzHBWZYQG]{Shifter Senses}

Prerequisite: Shifter

You gain proficiency in Wisdom (Perception), and while shifted have blindsight equal to a number of feet equal to 5 times your proficiency bonus.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.piGQg3qWxCtgajXH]{Strong Roots}

Prerequisite: Earth Genasi

You have tremorsense to a range of 10 feet. You can expand the range of this tremorsense to 60 feet with no action required until the end of your next turn. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

This tremorsense can be used to pinpoint the origin of vibrations within that radius, provided that you are in contact with the same ground, rock or stone surface, or similar material as the source of the vibrations. For the purpose of choosing targets for spells and abilities, a creature detected with tremorsense is a valid target when considering being able to see the target.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.AG4R8KiHJB117HHv]{Swift Withdrawal}

Prerequisite: Tortle

You can use your Shell Defense trait as a bonus action. If you become incapacitated you automatically withdraw into your shell (no action required). Standing from Prone as part of emerging from your Shell only requires 5 feet of movement.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.UVx0yELW4uPE4A3g]{Trigger Hoppy}

Prerequisite: Padfoot

When you roll for initiative, you may use your reaction to Rabbit Hop without expending a use.

@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.gtAFwdaAmTNMtsxK]{Wood Elf Magic}

Prerequisite: Elf (wood)

  • You learn the magic of the primeval woods, which are revered and protected by your people. You learn one druid cantrip of your choice, and your choice of either the longstrider or pass without trace spell which you can cast once without expending a spell slot. Once you cast it in this way, you cannot cast it in this way again until you finish a long rest. The spell's spellcasting ability is your choice of Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma.
  • If you select this bullet a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.360HwZ2lNIQOOE9q]{second time}, you learn both longstrider and pass without trace spells, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast these two spells in this way when you finish a long rest. You can also cast this spell using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spell's spellcasting ability is your choice of Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma.

These feats are in the Epic Boon category.
